sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Mission to Simplify Business Processes
sections.name: About
sections.label: About
sections.content:
### At Orderly Solutions, we believe in empowering businesses to achieve more by providing them with tools that simplify daily operations. Our mission is to support **small to medium-sized enterprises** with an **intuitive and reliable backend system** that manages customers, orders, and products efficiently.  
Our system ensures that:  
- **Customer Satisfaction**: Managing customer details comprehensively.  
- **Order Management**: Effortless tracking from initiation to fulfillment.  
- **Product Control**: Keep your product well organized and accessible.  

Join us in transforming your operational management to focus more on growth and less on administrative tasks.

images.name: Streamlined Process
images.description: A visual representation of a smooth, clean, and efficient business process flow.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive Solutions for Your Business
sections.name: Services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Features You'll Love:  
- **Customer Profiles**: Maintain all client information, ensuring easy accessibility and data security.  
- **Order Notes**: Capture special instructions with every order to ensure perfect deliveries.  
- **Integration with Products**: Sync your product catalog effortlessly with current inventories.  

Key Functional Requirements:  
- **Credit Checks**: Ensure customer's balance stays within defined limits.  
- **Balance and Orders Management**: Real-time updates ensuring order amount accurately reflects the current customer's balance.  
- **Unit Price Control**: Seamless item pricing transitions from product catalog to order fulfillment.
